Pre-release '''1.4.6''' is the first and only pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.4.6]], released on December 17, 2012.<ref>{{cite|url=http://www.mojang.com/2012/12/minecraft-1-4-6-pre-release/|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/0/http://www.mojang.com/2012/12/minecraft-1-4-6-pre-release/|title=Minecraft 1.4.6 Pre-release|author=Jens Bergensten|website=Mojang.com|date=December 17, 2012}}</ref>

This version was re-uploaded on the same day to fix an issue with mobs spinning.<ref name="reupload">{{ytl|-Og8KnXoxOQ}}</ref><ref>{{tweet|Dinnerbone|280696502408593408|Just sneakily pushed a new version of 1.4.6 to fix spinning mobs. If your mobs start dancing, redownload!|17 Dec 12}}</ref>
The release version of 1.4.6 differs from this reupload by fixing a crash issue.<ref>{{Tweet|Dinnerbone|280707555615981568|Had to do another sneaky update for crashes. No more, I promise! :(|17 Dec 12}}</ref>

This is the final pre-release released in 2012.

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
'''[[Bow]]s'''
* A high pitched sound is played when a player hits another player from far away with a bow.

=== General ===
'''[[Options]]'''
* Added an option to toggle touchscreen mode.
